Package STARSapp

Class Ser_File

java.lang.Object
STARSapp.Ser_File
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Course, Time, User
public class Ser_File
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Base class for the serializable classes that require saving and loading
Since:
2020-11-22
Version:
1.0
Author:
Huang Runtao

  • Constructor Details

    • Ser_File

      public Ser_File()

  • Method Details

    • isExist

      public static boolean isExist​(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String store_path)
      Check if a file exists
      Parameters:
      fName - The name of the file (without the filename extension)
      store_path - The location of the file
      Returns:
      true if the file exists; false if the file does not exist

    • loadData

      public static Ser_File loadData​(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String store_path, java.lang.String info_type, java.lang.String what_to_use_for_filename)
      Load an serializable object from a file
      Parameters:
      fName - The name of the file (without the filename extension)
      store_path - The location of the file
      info_type - The type of object stored in the file
      what_to_use_for_filename - The type of information to use as the filename
      Returns:
      the object after the file is deserialized

    • loadAllData

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Ser_File> loadAllData​(java.lang.String Path)
      Load all objects of a certain type from local files (Students and Courses)
      Parameters:
      Path - The location of that certain type of files
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of objects

    • saveData

      public static void saveData​(Ser_File s, java.lang.String store_path, java.lang.String info_type, java.lang.String filename)
      Save a serializable object as a file
      Parameters:
      s - The serializable object
      store_path - The location of the file
      info_type - The type of object stored in the file
      filename - The name of the file (without the filename extension)
